<template>
<!--  导航区-->
  <el-container>
    <router-link to="/home">跳转</router-link>
    <el-header>
      <Navigation/>
    </el-header>
<!--    内容区-->
    <el-main>
      <router-view></router-view>
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
  import Navigation from "./components/Navigation";
  import Home from "./pages/Home"
  export default {
    name: 'App',
    components:{
      Navigation,
      Home
    },
    watch: {
      // 如果路由有变化，会再次执行该方法
      '$route': 'fetchData'
    },
    methods:{
      
    }
    /*mounted() {
      this.$router.push('/home')
      console.log(this.$router)
    }*/
  }
</script>
